actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 26 of title 49 of the United States Code to provide that compressed gas cylinders shipped in interstate commerce be inspected in the United States.

summary.text: Requires that compressed gas cylinders shipped in interstate commerce be inspected in the United States. Defines such cylinders for purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 26 of title 49 of the United States Code to provide that compressed gas cylinders shipped in interstate commerce be inspected in the United States.
